mapper.insert: insert into User(id, username, pwd, isDelete) values (#{id}, #{username}, #{pwd}, #{isDelete})
mapper.select: select * from User WHERE ISDELETE = 0 and username = #{username} and pwd = #{pwd}
select * from User WHERE ISDELETE = 0 and username = #{username}
select username from User where ISDELETE = 0 and username != #{username} and state = 1
